title: Sidewall
description: a) A full width with just over one repeat. Rectangular compartments outlined with scrolls, enclosing alternating medallions of sheep in landscape and mounted stable-boy with horse at trough; to right, vertical band of scrollwork set with floral sprays; b) and c) give little more than one unit of the design. a) Printed in grays, blue, green and white on grey ground; b) printed in grays, blue, green and white on glazed white; c) printed in grisaille and white on grey ground.
name: Sidewall
